spell.name: Convocar Barlgura (UA)
entries: Convoques un {@creature barlgura} que apareix a un espai sense ocupar a l'abast.El {@creature barlgura} desapareix quan es queda a 0 punts de cop o el conjur s'acaba.

The {@creature barlgura} is hostile to all non-demons. Roll initiative for the {@creature barlgura}, which has its own turns. At the start of its turn, it moves toward and attacks the nearest non-demon it can perceive. If two or more creatures are equally near, it picks one at random. If it cannot see any potential enemies, the {@creature barlgura} moves in a random direction in search of foes.

Com a part del conjur, pots marcar un cercle al terra amb la sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores. El cercle és prou gran per embolcallar el teu espai. El {@creature barlgura} convocat no pot atravessar el cercle ni designar com a objectius qui hi estigui a dins.

spell.name: Convocar Hezrou (UA)

m.text: menjar que valgui 100 ors o més (el conjur ho consumeix)

entries: Convoques un {@creature hezrou} que apareix a un espai sense ocupar a l'abast.El {@creature hezrou} desapareix quan es queda a 0 punts de cop o el conjur s'acaba.

The {@creature hezrou}'s attitude depends on the value of the food used as a material component for this spell. Roll initiative for the {@creature hezrou}, which has its own turns. At the start of the {@creature hezrou}'s turn, the DM makes a secret Carisma check on your behalf, with a bonus equal to the food's value divided by 20. The check DC starts at 10 and increases by 2 each round. You can issue orders to the {@creature hezrou} and have it obey you as long as you succeed on the Carisma check.

If the check fails, the spell no longer requires concentration and the demon is no longer under your control. The {@creature hezrou} then focuses on devouring any corpses it can see. If there are no such meals at hand, it attacks the nearest creatures and eats anything it kills. If its hit points are reduced to below half its hit point maximum, it returns to the Abyss.

Com a part del conjur, pots marcar un cercle al terra amb la sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores. El cercle és prou gran per embolcallar el teu espai. El {@creature hezrou} convocat no pot atravessar el cercle ni designar com a objectius qui hi estigui a dins.

spell.name: Convocar Lesser Demon (UA)

components.m: un vial de sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores

entries: You summon up to a total of eight {@creature manes} or {@creature dretch||dretches} that appear in unoccupied spaces you can see within range. A {@creature manes} or {@creature dretch} disappears when it drops to 0 hit points or when the spell ends.
The demons are hostile to all creatures. Roll initiative for the summoned demons as a group, which has its own turns. The demons attack the nearest non-demons to the best of their ability.

Com a part del conjur, pots marcar un cercle al terra amb la sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores. El cercle és prou gran per embolcallar el teu espai. Els dimonis convocats no poden atravessar el cercle ni designar com a objectius qui hi estigui a dins. Emprar el material d'aquesta manera el consumeix.

entriesHigherLevel.name: A Nivells Superiors
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, you summon sixteen demons. If you cast it using a spell slot of 8th or 9th level, you summon thirty-two demons.

spell.name: Convocar Shadow Demon (UA)

components.m: un vial de sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores

entries: Convoques un {@creature shadow demon} que apareix a un espai sense ocupar a l'abast.El {@creature shadow demon} desapareix quan es queda a 0 punts de cop o el conjur s'acaba.

Roll initiative for the {@creature shadow demon}, which has its own turns. You can issue orders to the {@creature shadow demon}, and it obeys you as long as it can attack a creature on each of its turns and does not start its turn in an area of bright light. If either of these conditions is not met, the {@creature shadow demon} immediately makes a Carisma check contested by your Carisma check. If you fail the check, the spell no longer requires concentration and the demon is no longer under your control. The demon automatically succeeds on the check if it is more than 100 feet away from you.

Com a part del conjur, pots marcar un cercle al terra amb la sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores. El cercle és prou gran per embolcallar el teu espai. El {@creature shadow demon} convocat no pot atravessar el cercle ni designar com a objectius qui hi estigui a dins.

spell.name: Convocar Vrock (UA)

m.text: una gema que valgui 100 ors o més (el conjur ho consumeix)

entries: Convoques un {@creature vrock} que apareix a un espai sense ocupar a l'abast.El {@creature vrock} desapareix quan es queda a 0 punts de cop o el conjur s'acaba.

The {@creature vrock}'s attitude depends on the value of the gem used as a material component for this spell. Roll initiative for the {@creature vrock}, which has its own turns. At the start of the {@creature vrock}'s turn, the DM makes a secret Carisma check on your behalf, with a bonus equal to the gem's value divided by 20. The check DC starts at 10 and increases by 2 each round. You can issue orders to the {@creature vrock} and have it obey you as long as you succeed on the Carisma check.

If the check fails, the spell no longer requires concentration and the {@creature vrock} is no longer under your control. The {@creature vrock} takes no actions on its next turn and uses its telepathy to tell any creature it can see that it will fight in exchange for treasure. The creature that gives the {@creature vrock} the most expensive gem can command it for the next {@dice 1d6} rounds. At the end of that time, it offers the bargain again. If no one offers the {@creature vrock} treasure before its next turn begins, it attacks the nearest creatures for {@dice 1d6} rounds before returning to the Abyss.

Com a part del conjur, pots marcar un cercle al terra amb la sang d'un humanoide intel·ligent mort fa menys de 24 hores. El cercle és prou gran per embolcallar el teu espai. El {@creature vrock} convocat no pot atravessar el cercle ni designar com a objectius qui hi estigui a dins.
